means: 莫洛凯岛（美国）（在太平洋中北部，属夏威夷群岛，是麻风病人的隔离地）

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...夏威夷的收入水平高，观光客又多，科纳咖啡的售价极其昂贵，甚至连(综合科纳)(kona blend，科纳豆的含量不超过5%)都有人卖。邻近的岛屿如茂宜(maui)、卡瓦宜(kauai)、摩洛开(molokai)也纷纷开始商业化种植咖啡了。3品味科纳咖啡确实是世间的珍品，不易找到。真正的夏威夷科纳咖啡带有焦糖般的甜味，让人享受独特的快意，引你慢慢进入品尝咖啡的超然状态。在.

means.word_mean: 1. an island of central Hawaii (between Maui and Oahu)

auth_sentence.content: Farther up the coast, the insular island of Molokai, famous for its leper colony, hovers close offshore.
auth_sentence.res_content: Farther up the coast, the insular island of Molokai, famous for its leper colony, hovers close offshore.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Farther up the coast, the insular island of Molokai, famous for its leper colony, hovers close offshore.

auth_sentence.content: The remote Kalaupapa peninsula on Molokai is where Hawaii exiled leprosy patients between 1866 and 1969.
auth_sentence.res_content: The remote Kalaupapa peninsula on Molokai is where Hawaii exiled leprosy patients between 1866 and 1969.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The remote Kalaupapa peninsula on Molokai is where Hawaii exiled leprosy patients between 1866 and 1969.
